name: Finger Frenzy!
description:
The Definitive way to Play Finger Frenzy is through the Downloadable!

Welcome to Finger Frenzy! A Chaotic, high-score based game where the goal is to survive all of the wacky obstacles for as long as you can!

Controls:
S or Down Arrow to Slide, If done in Mid Air, it will perform a Ground Pound
Spacebar to Jump

This Game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 for the theme, Let there be Chaos.

The game is 3d, with Pixelized Art similar to Donkey Kong Country on the Super Nintendo Entertainment System
